ruleset.name: Apex Code Style Rules
ruleset.description: Custom rules for Apex code style and formatting

rule.name: MultipleStringContainsCalls
rule.message: Multiple String.contains() calls should be replaced with a regex pattern
rule.description: Multiple String.contains() calls in conditionals should be replaced with a regex pattern for better performance and maintainability. This rule detects when there are 2 or more contains() calls in a conditional expression.
